title: Revolutionary Road - implies keeping track of time

content.prompt: The narrator implies that keeping track of time provides

choices.label: a false sense of one's power over the world
an inducement to use one's time more wisely
an awareness that life involves constant change
a continuous sense of progress and achievement

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
